thread.title: Controversial new fertility treatment plans by the NHS | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Controversial new fertility treatment plans by the NHS | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephen Matthews For Mailonline
title: Controversial new fertility treatment plans by the NHS | Daily Mail Online
text: The IVF clampdown: Only women left infertile from cancer treatment and HIV will be able to start a family under controversial new NHS plans to save money Richmond CCG have created new proposals for the local community to vote on In its plans, fertility treatment could be off the cards for thousands of women Only those left infertile from cancer treatment and viruses could access it Experts fear that if the plans do go ahead then other CCGs could follow suit Critics argue that those who would be given access could face a reduced life
